content: *tiny crocheted violets* a kreinik website design by maggie petsch skill level intermediate size 7/8 in diameter *crochet is so trendy right now for clothing purses and pins make this quick and easy pin for mom grandma or yourself to enjoy this summer season kreinik manufacturing * materials needed * kreinik metallics blending filament 50m per spool 1 spool each purple #012 bfa green #008 bfb and star mauve #093 bfc * south maid crochet cotton size 10 350 yd per ball small amounts each purple #458 a myrtle green #484 b white #1 c and soft yellow #143 d * size 7 steel crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge * 12 length 1/8 wide white satin ribbon * 3/4 long pin back * tapestry needle * sewing needle and white sewing thread written directions are provided in pdf download
